dom: <input aria-label="email address" autocapitalize="off" autocorrect="off" class="grid__item one-whole" name="contact[email]" placeholder="email address" type="email" value=""/>

<input id="easylockdown-password" onkeypress="if( event.keycode == 13 && typeof easylockdown == 'object' && typeof easylockdown.checkunlockpassword == 'function' ) { event.preventdefault(); easylockdown.checkunlockpassword(this); }" placeholder="" style="width:100%;" type="password"/>
<input aria-label="what're you looking for?" autocomplete="off" class="input-group-field" id="searchbarinput" name="q" placeholder="what're you looking for?" type="search" value=""/>
feature: search searchbarinput q what re you looking for
